*:<b><i>/lib/galaxy/datatypes</i></b>
 Root of the datatypes package in Galaxy.;
**:<b><i>registry.py</i></b>
 Framework code for finding, configuring, and loading datatypes.;
**:<b><i>data.py</i></b>
 Contains base datatypes custom datatypes should inherit from.;
**:<b><i>text.py</i></b>
 Simple and base textual datatypes.;
**:<b><i>binary.py</i></b>
 Simple and base binary datatypes.;
